p: Figure 3 shows the complete block flow diagram (BFD) of a typical process that leads from the waste to the final products, but some alternatives may occur. The layout of the plant depends on different parameters including the equipment for each operation, energy-saving facilities, automation, environmental protection, and raw material content in terms of dry matter, protein, and fat. In particular, if the fat content is less than 3%, the recovery of oil could not be economically convenient [ 47].
